p: Instead of pressed pellets, Luo, Tsung and Wang synthesized a Mg-MOF-74 thin film as the Mg ion conductor to eliminate interparticle gaps that were inevitable for pressed pellets and enabled studies on the inherent ionic conductivity of MOFs (Luo et al., 2019). It showed the ionic conductivity of 3.17 × 10 −6 S cm −1 at the room temperature, which was in consistent with the previous report by Aubrey.
